line.comment: * disable.ammo = Disable all weapons using ammunitions
* Fix 1: No ammo weapon in turret 0 (avoid defenceless ships)

* Fix 4: No turret script on OOS NPC ships (Disabled by Nicoman35, because imho this fix would prevent any turrets OOS ships to run a script, thus making them useless when they are later IS, to be tested!!)
* Fix 4: Replaced disable all ion by ion disruptor only
* Added (Nicoman35): If aboard, use M.A.R.S. fight scripts
* Added (Nicoman35): No ammo weapon, if XRM is installed (XRM does not use ammo based weapons)
* LU Update (solarahawk): fixed probability For Remove Ion, previous probability was actually 1/4 chance (0-3).
* LU Update (solarahawk): corrected Wares codes to updated LU references.
* LU Update (solarahawk): temporarily disabled MARS code
* If this turret is not able to arm any lasers (missile turret), end arming
* Get all compatible laser types, remove crappy and forbidden laser types
* Remove IRE for all but M5 ship types
* Remove Ammo weapons - Fix 1 : No ammo weapon in turret 0 (avoid defenseless ships)
* Remove Ion weapons - Fix 5 : Reduced ion probability to 1/3
* Stop arming, if no weapons available for this turret
* Add and install - Fix 3 : Dual weapon in slot 0
* Init turret scripts on all turrets but front turret
* Use mars scripts on turrets of ships with mars software aboard
* if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {CCDS MK2} in cargo bay
* [THIS]-> begin task $turret.nb with script 'plugin.gz.mars.turret.offense' and priority 0: arg1=$turret.nb arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null

sval.val: disable.ammo = Disable all weapons using ammunitions
Fix 1: No ammo weapon in turret 0 (avoid defenceless ships)

Fix 4: No turret script on OOS NPC ships (Disabled by Nicoman35, because imho this fix would prevent any turrets OOS ships to run a script, thus making them useless when they are later IS, to be tested!!)
Fix 4: Replaced disable all ion by ion disruptor only
Added (Nicoman35): If aboard, use M.A.R.S. fight scripts
Added (Nicoman35): No ammo weapon, if XRM is installed (XRM does not use ammo based weapons)
LU Update (solarahawk): fixed probability For Remove Ion, previous probability was actually 1/4 chance (0-3).
LU Update (solarahawk): corrected Wares codes to updated LU references.
LU Update (solarahawk): temporarily disabled MARS code
If this turret is not able to arm any lasers (missile turret), end arming
Get all compatible laser types, remove crappy and forbidden laser types
Remove IRE for all but M5 ship types
Remove Ammo weapons - Fix 1 : No ammo weapon in turret 0 (avoid defenseless ships)
Remove Ion weapons - Fix 5 : Reduced ion probability to 1/3
Stop arming, if no weapons available for this turret
Add and install - Fix 3 : Dual weapon in slot 0
Init turret scripts on all turrets but front turret
Use mars scripts on turrets of ships with mars software aboard
if [THIS]-> get amount of ware {CCDS MK2} in cargo bay
[THIS]-> begin task $turret.nb with script 'plugin.gz.mars.turret.offense' and priority 0: arg1=$turret.nb arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
